outbox.translation[0].definitions[0].def: the place in a computer email program where messages that you have not sent yet are stored
outbox.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a container on an office desk that is used to hold letters, documents etc that have been dealt with and are ready to be taken away by someone such as a secretary
outbox.translation[1].definitions[0].def: the place on a computer where email messages that you have not sent yet are stored
outbox.translation[1].definitions[1].def: a flat container used to hold letters, papers etc that have been dealt with and are ready to be taken away
